snippet: For much of the last two decades, bankers advising big companies lost to powerful traders. Now, the pendulum is swinging back toward the deal makers.
abstract: For much of the last two decades, bankers advising big companies lost to powerful traders. Now, the pendulum is swinging back toward the deal makers.

headline.main: On Wall Street, Edge to Deal Makers
headline.print_headline: On Wall St., Edge to Deal Makers
